Uses of Package
org.ingatan.component.image

Packages that use org.ingatan.component.image
org.ingatan.component.image Classes to do with Ingatan's inbuilt image editor, including the image editor itself as ImageEditorPane. 
org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes Option panes for the tools in the inbuilt image editor. 
org.ingatan.event Event classes; I realised after the first few that ActionEvents and ActionListeners were a much better way of doing this. 
org.ingatan.image An image utilities class that provides mundane functionality, as well as the image editor controller which provides the backbone of event handling for the ImageEditorPane. 
org.ingatan.io Classes that deal with general input and output of data, including parsing and writing, zip packaging, and the generation of quizzes. 
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image used by org.ingatan.component.image
ImageCollectionBrowser
          This is essentially a clip-art library, with the user able to choose from different categories.
ImageCollectionBrowser.Category
          Encapsulates the name of the category and the filenames to the images that belong to that category.
ImageCollectionBrowser.PreviewPanel
          Paints the set image onto itself.
ImageEditorPane
          A simple image editor, including toolbar, colour chooser, tool options and a scrollable canvas.
JMathTeXCreationPane
          This pane is presented as a tool as part of the ImageAcquisitionDialog/.
LibraryResourceBrowser
          Displays all image files contained by the selected library.
Thumbnail
          Displays an ImageIcon in the style of a thumbnail.
ThumbnailPane
          Displays a panel of thumbnails.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image used by org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes
ImageEditorPane
          A simple image editor, including toolbar, colour chooser, tool options and a scrollable canvas.
ThumbnailPane
          Displays a panel of thumbnails.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image used by org.ingatan.event
ImageToolbar
          Provides a toolbar for the image editor.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image used by org.ingatan.image
EditorCanvas
          This extension of JPanel performs the following: Allows the user to write to an encapsualted BufferedImage using various tools Renders the BufferedImage to itself. Keeps an undo-redo record in the form of previous buffered images. Keeps track of the current selection (if any) that is made.
ImageEditorPane
          A simple image editor, including toolbar, colour chooser, tool options and a scrollable canvas.
ImageToolbar
          Provides a toolbar for the image editor.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image used by org.ingatan.io
ImageAcquisitionDialog
          Extension of the JFrame that ties together all image acquisition methods into a menu.
